situation.title: Shopping malls
situation.meta_description: Only shops carrying essential goods will be open in shopping centers - especially grocery stores, pharmacies and drugstores.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

All shops and stores in a shopping mall are opened. 

Restaurants and fast foods in shopping malls of sales area over 5 000 m² can serve only via a takeout window and sell takeaway food. Delivery service at these restaurants can be used to pick up your lunch of dinner.

Childeren's corners are closed.

A group of a maximum of 10 persons is allowed to enter a shop. The exemption is people living in the same household. The maximum number of persons allowed in a shop is limited by the sales to 1 person per 15m². 

In stores with an area of less than 15m², this restriction will not affect adolescents younger than 15 years of age, handicapped people owning a ZTP card. In stores, larger than 15m² exemption to the total number of people inside will be kids younger than 6 years of age accompanying another customer. Handicapped people owning a ZTP card will have the privilege to enter the shop first in line, so they will not have to wait in queues. Owners and operators of shops and stores must not require a person with a stroller to enter only with a shopping cart. A child in a stroller is not counted within the maximum limit of 15m² per shopping area.

It is also mandatory to adopt regime and organizational measures and queue management (in front of and in the shop).

Even though the epidemic situation is slightly better, try to buy products on e-shops. When coming personally to a shop it is recommended to pay by a credit or debit card.

If you are part of a higher risk group or are in quarantine (isolation), ask a neighbor, relative, or friend to do your shopping. If this isn't possible, you can reach out to volunteers. Help and deliveries to high-risk groups and the infected), who will be happy to help. You can also order online and get your shopping delivered to your doorstep.

Wi-fi networks are temporarily disabled. It is also not allowed to sit on benches inside a shopping mall. The goal of this measure aims for people not to gather.

Related FAQ can be found in life situation Retail.
